kdramaRecommendations.title: Alchemy of Souls
kdramaRecommendations.description: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

kdramaRecommendations.title: All of Us Are Dead
kdramaRecommendations.description: A high school becomes ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak. Trapped students must fight their way out — or turn into one of the rabid infected.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Backstreet Rookie
kdramaRecommendations.description: An audacious part-timer who is great at her job and a well-meaning manager who is suspicious of the new hire, team up to keep a convenience store afloat.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Cinderella and the Four Knights
kdramaRecommendations.description: Catching the eye of a wealthy gentleman, spunky Ha-won gets hired to live with his three immature grandsons so she can whip them into shape.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Descendants of the Sun
kdramaRecommendations.description: A love story between Captain Yoo Shi Jin, Korean Special Forces, and Doctor Kang Mo Yeon, surgeon at Haesung Hospital. Together they face danger in a war-torn country.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Dr. Romantic
kdramaRecommendations.description: An eccentric, triple board-certified virtuoso surgeon leaves a top job in Seoul and ends up at a provincial hospital, where he mentors young doctors.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Extraordinary You
kdramaRecommendations.description: When a high-school girl finds that she is merely a character from a comic book whose destiny is decided by the writer, she decides to change the plot to suit her desires and find the love of her life.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Flower of Evil
kdramaRecommendations.description: Hiding a twisted past, a man maintains his facade as the perfect husband to his detective wife — until she begins investigating a series of murders.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Love in the Moonlight
kdramaRecommendations.description: A young Joseon woman who's lived her whole life as a man ends up as a eunuch in the royal palace, where she begins to bond with the crown prince.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Lovely Runner
kdramaRecommendations.description: Years after a K-pop star saves her life, a fan learns of his death — but when she's suddenly transported to the past, she sets out to change their fate.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Moon Lovers: Scarlet Heart Ryeo
kdramaRecommendations.description: A 25-year-old woman from the 21st century finds herself transported back to the Goryeo Dynasty where she awakens in the body of a 16-year-old girl.

kdramaRecommendations.title: My Dearest
kdramaRecommendations.description: As war tears the nation apart, a noblewoman and a mysterious man cross paths, igniting a love that defies destiny — but secrets from the past threaten to pull them apart.

kdramaRecommendations.title: My Only Love Song
kdramaRecommendations.description: When things don't go her way during a shooting for her new show, a top actress runs away in an old van that guides her on a time-traveling journey.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Resident Playbook
kdramaRecommendations.description: First-year OBGYN residents at Yulje Medical Center navigate the chaos of their work and personal lives, all in their quest to become exceptional doctors.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Sassy Go Go
kdramaRecommendations.description: At a high school where grades rule all, a mismatched group of students from rival clubs are forced to unite — shaking up the system with a rebellious cheer squad.

kdramaRecommendations.title: School 2017
kdramaRecommendations.description: In a high school obsessed with rankings and discipline, a group of students fights injustice while uncovering the identity of a rule-breaking mystery student.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Splash Splash Love
kdramaRecommendations.description: A timid student escapes her stressful life, only to find herself caught in an unexpected journey where time and fate blur.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Strong Girl Bong-soon
kdramaRecommendations.description: Born with supernatural strength, Bong-soon fights evil and procures justice while getting tangled in a love triangle with her CEO boss and cop crush.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Strong Girl Nam-soon
kdramaRecommendations.description: Gifted with superhuman strength, a young woman returns to Korea to find her birth family — only to be entangled in a drug case that could test her power.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Study Group
kdramaRecommendations.description: In a violent high school where fists speak louder than books, a quiet student forms a study group — not just to survive exams, but the daily chaos around him.

kdramaRecommendations.title: The Atypical Family
kdramaRecommendations.description: Once blessed with unique superpowers, a family loses their abilities due to modern day problems — until a mysterious woman changes everything.

kdramaRecommendations.title: The Penthouse: War in Life
kdramaRecommendations.description: Insatiably ambitious residents of Seoul's most luxurious apartment throw their morals aside to achieve dizzying heights of wealth and power.

kdramaRecommendations.title: The Silent Sea
kdramaRecommendations.description: During a perilous 24-hour mission on the moon, space explorers try to retrieve samples from an abandoned research facility steeped in classified secrets.

kdramaRecommendations.title: The Sound of Magic
kdramaRecommendations.description: A magician living in an abandoned theme park makes troubles disappear and hope reappear for a disenchanted teen enduring harsh realities.

kdramaRecommendations.title: The Trauma Code: Heroes on Call
kdramaRecommendations.description: To create a top-tier trauma center, a war-seasoned doctor arrives — bringing his blunt but skilled ways to transform his team into life-saving mavericks.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Undercover High School
kdramaRecommendations.description: To dismantle a crime ring embedded in a prestigious high school, an undercover agent must become the perfect student.

kdramaRecommendations.title: Welcome To Waikiki
kdramaRecommendations.description: To finance their own film project, an aspiring director, actor and screenwriter run a Seoul guesthouse that brings antics and romance into their lives.

cdramaRecommendations.title: A Love So Beautiful
cdramaRecommendations.description: The ups and downs of school, family and growing up test the affection between a budding artist and her handsome but indifferent classmate and neighbor.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Falling Into Your Smile
cdramaRecommendations.description: After joining an all-male e-sports team, an amateur gamer tests her skills and leads her team to the world championships.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Gank Your Heart
cdramaRecommendations.description: A passionate streamer and a cold pro gamer clash in the world of e-sports, where rivalry, romance, and ambition collide.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Go Go Squid!
cdramaRecommendations.description: A sweet coder falls for a legendary e-sports star, but winning his heart might be harder than any competition she’s faced.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Hidden Love
cdramaRecommendations.description: Since high school, Sang Zhi has had a crush on Duan Jiaxu. When fate brings them together again, they find a chance to embark on a sweet relationship.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Love Game in Eastern Fantasy
cdramaRecommendations.description: Pulled into the pages of a fantasy novel, a woman is shocked to find herself stuck in the role of a villain. Now, she must battle to rewrite her destiny.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Love O2O
cdramaRecommendations.description: When a computer-science major gets dumped by her 'husband' in an online role-playing game, she attracts a new proposal from the game’s top player.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Master Devil Do Not Kiss Me
cdramaRecommendations.description: After losing everything, a fierce teen is forced to live with a ruthless heir — and neither of them is ready for what comes next.

cdramaRecommendations.title: My Girlfriend is an Alien
cdramaRecommendations.description: After arriving from another planet, a quirky young alien tries to adapt to Earth — until an unexpected romance complicates everything.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Perfect and Casual
cdramaRecommendations.description: A serious professor and a carefree student enter a fake marriage, but unexpected feelings soon start to blur the lines between pretense and reality.

cdramaRecommendations.title: The Best Thing
cdramaRecommendations.description: A hotel manager battling insomnia turns to a traditional doctor for help — but their sessions unlock more than just healing, sparking an unexpected connection.

cdramaRecommendations.title: The Brightest Star in the Sky
cdramaRecommendations.description: In the glare of fame, a determined music lover steps into a world of secrets and silence — where dreams burn bright but shadows linger.

cdramaRecommendations.title: The Eternal Love
cdramaRecommendations.description: Forced into marriage and haunted by a split soul, a noblewoman grapples with love, identity, and a modern spirit trapped in the past.

cdramaRecommendations.title: The Romance of Tiger and Rose
cdramaRecommendations.description: A screenwriter is trapped in her own drama as a minor character facing death. To survive, she must outwit palace politics and confront a prince who may change her destiny.

cdramaRecommendations.title: Unforgettable Love
cdramaRecommendations.description: A CEO and a child psychologist join forces to protect a child, but their growing connection begins to rewrite both their lives in ways they never expected.

cdramaRecommendations.title: When We Were Young
cdramaRecommendations.description: After losing her dreams, Yang Xi faces the bike thief who took her crown — and high school just got a whole lot more complicated.
